title: Remediation of lead toxicity with waste-bio materials from aqueous solutions in fixed-bed column using response surface methodology
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Aanisa Manzoor Shah, Inayat Mustafa Khan, Zhenjie Du, Rehana Rasool, Raihana Habib Kant, Shakeel Mir, Tahir A. Sheikh, Fehim Jeelani Wani, M. Ayoub Bhat, Javid A. Bhat, M.H.
